alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 12 at 2:11PM PST until December 13 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Francisco Bay Shoreline and North Bay Shoreline. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running around 0.50 - 0.75 feet above tidal predictions. High tide will peak at 10:42 AM PST Wednesday morning at 6.66 feet, resulting in minor coastal flooding for low-lying, flood-prone spots adjacent to the San Francisco Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
